verbose_text: By contrast, the inhibition of Notch3 by gamma-secretase inhibitor (GSI) induces apoptosis and suppresses the proliferation of cancer cells through the downregulation of the pro survival proteins, pBcl-2 and pBcl-xL, and not Bax in NSCLC.
evidence: Notch3 by gamma-secretase inhibitor (GSI) induces apoptosis and suppresses the proliferation
